p: Results from the O. speciosa fixed almond oil physicochemical characterization are expressed in Table 2. The oil presented a moisture content of 0.90%, representing a minimum percentage of non-combined water (<1%), suggesting high oil quality and durability [ 12]. Water content values lower than 1.0% were observed for the babassu fixed oils in the municipalities of São Luís and Imperatriz do Maranhão, Northeast Brazil [ 13].
